label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Made GRPCRoute optional in edge-24.8.1, allowing Linkerd to run without GRPCRoute functionality if the CRD is not installed, instead of failing to start.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Improved the status text when an HTTPRoute was incorrectly configured with parentRef pointing to a headless service, making it easier to debug.

label: kind/feature
impact/medium
notes.text: Ensured that trace-level logs honored the proxy.logHTTPHeaders setting.
